channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Taylor Swift Deposition Off Limits to Justin Baldoni, Judge Rules: Lack of ‘Appropriate Diligence’
item.description: Taylor Swift's deposition stays under wraps for Justin Baldoni! 🕵️‍♂️ Who else is dying to know what happened? 🕵️‍♀️ #MusicGossip

item.title: Sharon Osbourne Thanks Fans for ‘Overwhelming Love’ After Ozzy’s Death
item.description: 🤘 Sharon Osbourne feels the love from fans following Ozzy's passing. Let's keep spreading that positive energy! 💕 #rockon #musicnews

item.title: Song of the Week: Spinal Tap Enlist Paul McCartney for the Downright Joyous “Cups and Cakes”
item.description: 🎸 Get ready to rock with Spinal Tap and Paul McCartney on their joyful collab "Cups and Cakes"! 🍰🎶 #RockLegends #CollaborationGoals

item.title: Djo Just Dropped His Second Album Of 2025
item.description: 🚀 Groove into the future with Djo's latest album drop! 🎶✨ Who's ready for some fresh tunes? #NewMusicAlert #Djo2025

item.title: John Fogerty Bringing CCR Classics to Las Vegas Residency
item.description: 🎸 Vegas vibes with John Fogerty! Get ready to rock out to CCR classics in Sin City! 🎶 #RockAndRollRevival
